Sinopse: Aspiring actor Greg Sestero befriends the eccentric Tommy Wiseau. The two travel to L.A., and when Hollywood rejects them, Tommy decides to write, direct, produce and star in their own movie. That movie is, "The Room," which has attained cult status as the "Citizen Kane" of bad movies.—rorybobglynn
